timeline.bodyText: Please introduce public static final String.
timeline.author: vrozov

replies.bodyText: These values are being set in a private method. This will need us to define it at class level and initialize the values in the constructor. Any reason for preferring this?
replies.author: debjanibnrj

replies.bodyText: It is a standard practice to define constant string as a class level variable.
replies.author: vrozov
